Package ca.cgjennings.ui

Class JIconSelector<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • ca.cgjennings.ui.JIconSelector<S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineCapSelector, LineJoinSelector
    public class JIconSelector<S>
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    A control that consists of a list of icon buttons for selecting from a group of options. Its applications and uses are similar to a combo box, but suited for a small list of fixed options that can be represented visually.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Chris Jennings
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • JIconSelector

        public JIconSelector()
        Creates a new, empty button combo.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(S item)
        Adds an item to the list, obtaining an icon and tool tip text from the item itself. The specified item must implement the IconProvider interface, or a ClassCastException will be thrown. The tool tip text will be set to the item's toString() value.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(S item,
                    java.lang.String toolTipText)
        Adds an item to the list, obtaining an icon and tool tip text from the item itself. The specified item must implement the IconProvider interface, or a ClassCastException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add
        toolTipText - the tool tip text (may be null)

      • addItem

        public void addItem​(S item,
                    javax.swing.Icon icon,
                    java.lang.String toolTipText)
        Adds an item to the list, using the specified icon and tool tip text to represent it. If the item is already in the list, this has no effect.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add to the list
        icon - the non-null icon for the item
        toolTipText - the tool tip text (may be null)

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem​(S item)
        Removes the item from the list. Has no effect if the item is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to remove

      • getSelectedItem

        public S getSelectedItem()
        Returns the selected item in the list, or null if there is no selection.
        Returns:
        the selected item

      • setSelectedItem

        public void setSelectedItem​(S item)
        Sets the selected item. If null, the selection is cleared.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to select

      • getButton

        protected javax.swing.JToggleButton getButton​(int index)

      • addActionListener

        public void addActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
        Adds an ActionListener to the list.
        Parameters:
        l - the ActionListener to be added

      • removeActionListener

        public void removeActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener l)
        Removes an ActionListener from the list.
        Parameters:
        l - the listener to be removed

      • fireActionPerformed

        protected void fireActionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
        Notifies all listeners that have registered interest for notification on this event type. The event instance is lazily created using the event parameter.
        Parameters:
        event - the ActionEvent object
        See Also:
        EventListenerList
